FuncDef: The display pki rsa local-key-pair command displays the public key in the RSA key pair. The display pki rsa local-key-pair command displays the public key in the RSA key pair.
CLIs: display pki rsa local-key-pair { pem | pkcs12 } <file-name> [ password <password> ]
display pki rsa local-key-pair [ name <key-name> ] public

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the file format is PEM.
-

Indicates that the file format is PKCS12.
-

Specifies the name of the file that contains the RSA key pair.
The file name must already exist.

Specifies the decryption password of RSA key pair. The value must be the same as the password set when it was exported.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the RSA key pair name.
The RSA key pair name must already exist.
